name: Oskar by Skarbe
tagline: AI agent in your inbox that follows up automatically.
description: Meet Oskar - an AI agent inside Skarbe. He's new. Before, you had to handle sales tasks manually. Now Oskar does them for you: he qualifies contacts, follows up automatically, enriches data, and tracks deals. He works while you build your business.

name: Sheet0
tagline: YOLO mode comes to spreadsheets
description: YOLO mode comes to spreadsheets! üí™üèª Ask a question, list your sources, and let hit auto-run: sheet0‚Äôs cloud browser grabs data in parallel, cleans it, and produces an interactive, tidy sheet for your enjoyment. Flip between charts, tables, and SQL. Share or export in one click. No guesswork, no hallucinations‚Äîevery answer is backed by an auditable TiDB database.

name: TheySaid 3.0
tagline: The everything app, for feedback
description: TheySaid 3.0 is here, smarter, more powerful, and built for scale. Every one of your most requested features is in this release: 2-way voice, usability testing, AI forms, AI Insights 2.0, integrations, panel recruiting, and more.

name: Cal ID
tagline: Schedule and monetize meetings for free
description: Cal ID is a fully open-source scheduling tool for solos and teams, with unlimited meetings, comprehensive integrations, real human support ‚Äì and amazing features shipping at lightspeed.

name: Passionfruit Labs
tagline: Turn AI Mentions & Citations Into Revenue
description: Track real revenue from AI search, see exactly which competitor pages win citations, learn the sentiment LLMs have of your brand and get instant recommendations that actually work. Stop overpaying $500+/month for GEO tools for synthetic data, let Passionfruit Labs prove ROI fast!

name: Sensay AI Offboarding
tagline: AI Offboarding that captures knowledge, not paperwork.
description: Sensay captures what employees know before they leave - through AI interviews, file uploads, and chatbots - turning offboarding into a living knowledge base. No more lost expertise, just faster onboarding and continuous team learning.

name: AlterBase
tagline: Find better alternatives
description: Discover better alternatives to well-known software and tools. Compare features, pricing, and find the perfect tool for your needs. Submit your tool and explore better alternatives.

name: Lumi
tagline: Read smarter, not harder
description: Lumi is an AI reading experiment from Google's PAIR. Instead of summarizing, it adds a lightweight AI layer directly on top of arXiv papers. It highlights main points in the source text, makes references clickable, and lets you ask contextual questions about any selected text or image.

name: Citable
tagline: Make brands show up in Agentic Search
description: Citable helps brands show up in AI answers. We simulate real personas by pre-warming AI accounts (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Claude, Grok) with memory, then run thousands of prompts daily to measure share-of-voice and capture every cited source. We surface gaps by persona, market, and model‚Äîand explain why. Finally, we give prescriptive actions: publish specific articles, join targeted Reddit threads, and prioritize the highest-leverage plays for your team.

name: Magic MCP by Metorial
tagline: 600+ integrations for vibe coding, zero config required
description: The enterprise-grade platform for connecting AI to real-world tools. Metorial provides 600+ MCP integrations with truly serverless hosting, one-line OAuth, and full observability. Now with Magic MCP: one-click integration access for Cursor, Claude Code, and GitHub Copilot using fully-managed remote MCP servers. Open-source, self-hostable, built for developers.

name: Primer
tagline: AI agents that demo, onboard, and support your product
description: Primer agents are experts on your product and give live, personalized walkthroughs like your best team member ‚Äì from sales to support ‚Äì but in any language, 24/7. We founded Primer on a simple belief: every product should come with an expert on tap.

name: ThreadGPT
tagline: ChatpGT with threads to stop long scrolling & broken context
description: ThreadGPT ‚Äî a Chrome extension that brings threading to ChatGPT. Start a thread from any response, continue the conversation in a sidebar, and keep it linked for easy reference. Try 10 free threads and help shape the feedback!

name: OpenSigner
tagline: Open-source non-custodial wallet solution
description: OpenSigner is an open-source, self-hostable key management stack for non-custodial wallets. Create Ethereum & Solana wallets without custody, plug into any auth, run in our cloud or self-host, avoid vendor lock-in.

name: ComplyDo
tagline: More Comply, Less Do
description: ComplyDo automates how enterprises comply with hundreds of global regulations. Already used by global enterprises, ComplyDo helps organizations stay compliant continuously and scale across markets. Without a fleet of consultants, it: - Extracts requirements and obligations - Maps them to your internal controls and policies - Identifies gaps and next steps - Monitors changes across frameworks

name: Ecomcoder
tagline: Let AI Edit Existing Shopify Stores to Increase Conversion
description: Meet Ecomcoder, the easiest way for Shopify store owners to create high-converting designs and content directly within Shopify‚Äôs own theme system. No external builders, plugins, or complicated integrations required. Ecomcoder replaces expensive apps and slow developers, giving every store owner the power to scale a real, profitable Shopify business, fast.

name: Eume
tagline: Work with your energy, not against it
description: Get your personal energy calendar ‚Äî based on your birth chart and the planets moving today ‚Äî showing when to focus, create, or rest.

name: Sanitize Email
tagline: Validate email lists with reliable accuracy
description: Sanitizeemail delivers fast, accurate bulk email verification powered by AI. Unlike other validators, it filters duplicates supports team collaboration, and offers seamless API integration for real-time validation. With advanced SMTP, MX, and DMARC checks, it improves email deliverability, reduces bounce rates, and protects sender reputation all in one scalable, easy-to-use platform.

name: FRAI
tagline: Framework of Responsible Artificial Intelligence
description: FRAI (Framework of Responsible Artificial Intelligence) helps you automatically scan websites for AI usage and test chatbots for bias and safety. Get compliance ready for EU AI Act and ISO 42001. 100% FREE to start, staying FREE forever within usage limits.

name: Taskavel - now with the power of Ai!
tagline: No bloat. Just fast, clean, and powerful task management.
description: Taskavel is a descendant of Workzone, with a powerful Ai suggesting tool, a clean and fast project management tool for developers and small teams. Combine Kanban boards, time tracking, invoicing, and checklists to stay productive without distractions. Free to start, simple to master.

name: Poche
tagline: Your team's links, organized by AI
description: Your team's links, organized by AI. Poche is designed to help teams capture, organize, and search links shared in Slack.

tagline: AI agent in your inbox that follows up automatically.
